definitions.text: a man's sleeveless garment worn underneath a coat
a collarless men's undergarment for the upper part of the body

examples: They vested the council with special rights

definitions.text: place (authority, property, or rights) in the control of a person or group of persons
examples: She vested her vast fortune in her two sons
The property vests in the trustees

definitions.text: clothe formally; especially in ecclesiastical robes
